Join Chloe Frazer in her quest to find the Tusk of Ganesh

Chloe Frazer
Australian-Indian treasure hunter and protagonist of Uncharted: The Lost Legacy. Chloe is searching for the ancient Tusk of Ganesh in the Western Ghats of India. Her journey takes her through ancient Hoysala temples and treacherous terrain.
